could someone please create a mod that gives us a navball in EVA?

Edited September 4, 2014 by jab136

I think Navball HUD works for EVA... will go give it a try for you:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81543-0-24-2-NavHud-a-NavBall-inspired-Heads-Up-Display-1-1-1?highlight=navball+hud

D
thanks, but that doesn't look like what I am looking for, I want just the regular navball, with a velocity readout

While it lacks the velocity readout, I personally prefer NavHud to the Navball in almost every way. The only time I don't prefer it is while landing because I like to look down and the indicators therefore work in mirror mode to what I expect.
well, I will be using this while landing, and need the velocity readout, (in low grav environments, it is easier and faster to get around using sub orbital jumps while on eva)

Without something new you can also use MJ case with mechanic_jeb something from GavinZac, I know a kerbal with a MJ case on his back, but you have all MJ feature as bonus (not sure how MJ will deal with that, better not to try !)

could someone please create a mod that gives us a navball in EVA?

I'm searching for something similar too!
or at least a compass to point north.
That would always be "up" eg. the way kerbals naturally faces whenever you reorient them on EVA (in space). Something that I actually wish was changed....
